lead_paragraph: HASSETT--Walter J.,on Monday July 11, 2016. Lifelong NYC resident. WWII Veteran. Graduate of Fordham University (BA) and NYU (MBA). Retired Vice President Chase Bank. Beloved husband of the late Catherine (nee Beirne). Reposing at John Krtil Funeral Home, 1297 First Ave. (70 St.) on Sunday, July 17th from 2-4 and 7-9pm. Mass of Christian Burial Monday 10am at St. Jean Baptiste, Lexington Ave. at 76th St. Interment at Gate of Heaven Cemetery, Valhalla, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations in his memory may be made to the John H. Mark Scholarship at Manhattan College, Riverdale, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  HASSETT, WALTER J.
